question: The final stretch of phase 1 of which Metro service was inaugurated recently?
explanation:
The Chief Minister of Kerala Pinarayi Vijayan inaugurated the Kochi Metroâ€™s final stretch of the Phase-I covering Thykoodam to Petta which is 3 km long.
The inauguration was made virtually. With this, the phase-1 of Kochi Metro is complete at a cost of Rs.6218 crore. The inaugural function was presided by Hardeep Singh Puri, Union Minister of Housing & Urban Affairs.
